text: Poets Corner Group is a poetry group in India founded in 2011 by poet Yaseen Anwer. The group hosts online competitions, poetry reading events, panel discussions, book launches, workshops, and other activities. Poets Corner organizes annual poetry event in New Delhi called Delhi Poetry Festival. It has published over 21 anthologies in both English and Hindi. == Related pages == * Delhi Poetry Festival == References == == Other websites == * corner.in/ Official website * CNN-IBN Category:Poetry Category:Cultural organizations Category:Organizations based in India
title: Poets Corner Group
